Author: Tom Hollander
Summary: Looks up details of any Azure Classic (ASM) Virtual Machines across whatever subscriptions you have access to, and writes them to a .CSV file. This allows you to easily analyse the details in Excel, for example to show charts or Pivot Tables listing VMs by size, status, location,
Title: Dump Azure Classic VMs to CSV
UserTags: Microsoft Azure, Microsoft Azure Virtual Machines, Azure Service Manager
